channel.title: C on 当然我在扯淡
channel.description: Recent content in C on 当然我在扯淡

item.title: C#调用C语言DLL
item.description: 0x00 引言 再简单的事情，也需要有人去做。 0x01 .h文件 demo.h extern "C" __declspec(dllexport) double Add(double a, double b); 0x02 .cpp文件 demo.cpp double Add( double a, double b ) { return a+b; } 0x03 C#实现 prograss.cs using System.Runtime.InteropServices; [DllImport("MathFuncsDll.dll", CallingConvention=CallingConvention.Cdecl)] public static extern double Add(double a, double b); public static void main() { c = Add(c, c); } 0x04 UPDATE 2019-02-18
